summary.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

span.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

summary.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

span.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 几何形状与比较Geometry Compared to Shape 类具有， ，和其他呈现属性以及派生的类没有。The class has a , , and other rendering properties that and its derived classes lack. 类是并参与布局系统中; 因此它的派生的类可用作任何支持的元素的内容子级。The class is a and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports children. 类，但是，只需定义的几何形状，并不能呈现自身。The class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself. 由于其简单性，它具有更广泛的使用。Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses. **Freezable 功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供多种特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，变为只读以提高之间共享性能、 克隆以及变为线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关所提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

span.para: 尽管此类是抽象的但不能公开扩展。
Although this class is abstract, it is not publicly extensible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用默认的公差因子 (由描述属性) 时组合几何图形。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when combining geometries. 若要指定自己的公差因子，使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 公差因子指定此多边形近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 公差值越小生成更好地大概确定的但需要更多的处理比使用较大的公差因子近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用时，应涉及需要在认真考虑执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下，或将更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用仅当时任何满足以下条件：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 几何图形的任一已的值几何图形的并且自交 (即实际上很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果几何图形是创建一次，随后将缓存）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常情况下，生成的输出小于。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 将描边或路径动画中使用生成的几何图形和不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 公差因子指定此多边形近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 公差值越小生成更好地大概确定的但需要更多的处理比使用较大的公差因子近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用时，应涉及需要在认真考虑执行联合，因为它会占用大量的 CPU。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下，或将更好地工作。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用仅当时任何满足以下条件：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 几何图形的任一已的值几何图形的并且自交 (即实际上很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间并不是问题，但空间 （例如，如果几何图形是创建一次，随后将缓存）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常情况下，生成的输出小于。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 将描边或路径动画中使用生成的几何图形和不提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 公差因子指定此多边形近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 公差值越小生成更好地大概确定的但需要更多的处理比使用较大的公差因子近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用默认的公差因子 (由描述属性) 时处理几何图形。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when processing the geometry. 若要指定自己的公差因子，使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 公差因子指定此多边形近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 公差值越小生成更好地大概确定的但需要更多的处理比使用较大的公差因子近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些方法 (如) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 公差因子指定此多边形近似中两点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 公差值越小生成更好地大概确定的但需要更多的处理比使用较大的公差因子近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对象没有转换值，则此方法返回标识转换。This method returns the identity transformation if the current object has no transformation value. 否则，它将返回应用于当前对象。Otherwise, it returns the applied to the current object. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性，将应用到对象。The following example shows how to use the property to apply a to a object. 该示例使用若要创建三个复合形状对象，然后将该几何图形旋转 45 度使用属性。The example uses a to create a composite shape from three objects and then rotates the geometry 45 degrees by using the property.
